document_data.name: Deflection
document_data.mainbody: '''''Deflection''''' was a common [[spell]] used by [[shugenja]] in [[Kara-Tur]]. The spell was very rare outside Kara-Tur.
document_data.Effects:
When cast, this spell created a magical shield around a creature. The spell protected a creature from missiles and physical attacks.

''[[Attraction]]'' was the reverse of the spell. When cast on a creature, they suffered additional damage to missiles and physical attacks.
document_data.Components: This spell required only [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component|somatic]] components to be cast.
